alert.note: Alert for Central Phoenix; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 04 at 2:42PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 330 PM MST... At 241 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fiesta Mall, or near Tempe, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Tempe, Paradise Valley, East Mesa, Mesa Riverview Mall, Tempe Marketplace, Papago Park, Arizona Mills Mall, Gilbert City Hall, Falcon Field Airport, Salt River Indian Community, Downtown Mesa, Chandler City Hall, Freestone Park, Downtown Scottsdale, Arizona State University and Fiesta Mall. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 153 and 156. US Highway 60 between mile markers 173 and 186. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 166 and 185. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Phoenix; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley
